coffee_and_espresso_creations.name: Espresso Serenité
coffee_and_espresso_creations.description: A single shot of rich, bold espresso, the perfect start to your day. The intense flavor delivers a smooth yet invigorating experience that enhances your morning routine.

coffee_and_espresso_creations.name: Café Latte
coffee_and_espresso_creations.description: A classic espresso-based drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and a soft layer of foam. This smooth and creamy coffee offers the perfect balance of rich espresso and frothy milk for a comforting experience.

coffee_and_espresso_creations.name: Cappuccino Divin
coffee_and_espresso_creations.description: Espresso with velvety steamed milk and a delicate foam topping, creating a rich yet balanced taste. The airy foam adds a light, smooth texture, perfect for sipping throughout the day.

coffee_and_espresso_creations.name: Café au Lait
coffee_and_espresso_creations.description: A traditional French coffee that combines espresso with equal parts steamed milk, creating a creamy and rich flavor with a velvety finish, perfect for those who enjoy a milkier coffee.

coffee_and_espresso_creations.name: Caramel Creme Brûlée Latte
coffee_and_espresso_creations.description: Espresso mixed with a sweet caramel syrup, steamed milk, and a crème brûlée twist, finished with a light foam topping. This indulgent coffee drink has hints of caramelized sugar and vanilla, offering a rich and luxurious treat.

coffee_and_espresso_creations.name: Mocha Mystique
coffee_and_espresso_creations.description: Espresso with a decadent chocolate blend and steamed milk, crowned with whipped cream for a rich, velvety drink. The combination of chocolate and coffee creates an irresistibly sweet and bitter harmony.

specialty_brews_and_teas.name: Café Viennois
specialty_brews_and_teas.description: A rich espresso topped with a generous amount of whipped cream and a d usting of cocoa powder. This elegant coffee drink is perfect for those who want a sweet and creamy alternative to traditional espresso.

specialty_brews_and_teas.name: Matcha Serenity
specialty_brews_and_teas.description: Steamed milk paired with premium matcha green tea powder. This calming, green beverage is both flavorful and soothing, providing a balance of earthy matcha with creamy milk.

specialty_brews_and_teas.name: Lavender Earl Grey
specialty_brews_and_teas.description: A fragrant black tea infused with lavender and bergamot, offering a relaxing, aromatic experience. The floral notes combined with the tea's light citrusy flavor make for a perfectly calming cup.

specialty_brews_and_teas.name: Chai Éclat
specialty_brews_and_teas.description: A spiced chai tea served with steamed milk. This comforting and warming drink features a blend of cinnamon, cardamom, and other spices, creating a rich, cozy beverage perfect for chilly days.

specialty_brews_and_teas.name: Jasmine Green Tea
specialty_brews_and_teas.description: A delicate and fragrant green tea infused with jasmine blossoms. This tea is perfect for those who seek tranquility and enjoy a fragrant, floral flavor in their tea.

specialty_brews_and_teas.name: Iced Rose Lemonade
specialty_brews_and_teas.description: A refreshing and aromatic blend of rose petals and lemonade, served chilled. The floral notes from the rose petals combine with the tartness of the lemonade, creating a refreshing drink that’s both fragrant and revitalizing.

pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.name: Pain au Chocolat
pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.description: A buttery, flaky pastry with a rich dark chocolate center. The layers of buttery dough create a crisp exterior that gives way to the smooth, melty chocolate inside.

pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.name: Lemon & Almond Cake
pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.description: A moist, tangy cake featuring a light almond flavor and topped with a sweet glaze. The citrusy lemon flavor perfectly complements the delicate almond taste, making this cake a delightful treat.

pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.name: Raspberry Tart
pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.description: A buttery shortcrust filled with a creamy custard and topped with fresh raspberries. This tart combines the richness of custard with the fresh, tart flavor of raspberries, creating a sweet yet tangy dessert.

pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.name: Madeleine de Paris
pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.description: Soft, buttery French madeleine cookies with a hint of lemon zest. These little cakes are perfect for pairing with tea or coffee and have a light, delicate texture.

pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.name: Crêpes Suzette
pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.description: Thin crêpes served with a rich orange liqueur sauce, butter, and sugar, flambéed for a dramatic and luxurious finish. This French classic is both indulgent and impressive.

pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.name: Tiramisu Étoilé
pastries_and_sweet_indulgences.description: A delicate version of the classic tiramisu, made with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream. This dessert is both creamy and coffee-flavored, with a soft, airy texture.

savory_delights.name: Croque Monsieur
savory_delights.description: A traditional French grilled ham and cheese sandwich, made with gruyère cheese and béchamel sauce. This savory dish features a crispy exterior and a gooey, cheesy filling, offering a satisfying, indulgent meal.

savory_delights.name: Quiche Lorraine
savory_delights.description: A savory quiche with bacon, Swiss cheese, and a creamy custard base. This rich and hearty dish is perfect for a light lunch or a savory breakfast.

savory_delights.name: Smoked Salmon Tartine
savory_delights.description: A crisp slice of sourdough topped with smoked salmon, cream cheese, and fresh dill. This open-faced sandwich is both fresh and flavorful, making it a sophisticated option for breakfast or brunch.

savory_delights.name: Avocado & Poached Egg Toast
savory_delights.description: Smashed avocado spread on whole grain toast, topped with a perfectly poached egg. This dish combines the richness of avocado with the delicate flavor of a poached egg for a healthy, satisfying meal.

savory_delights.name: Mediterranean Wrap
savory_delights.description: A fresh wrap filled with hummus, cucumber, tomato, olives, and feta cheese. This vibrant wrap is perfect for those seeking a light yet flavorful savory meal.

signature_smoothies_and_refreshers.name: Café Serenité Smoothie
signature_smoothies_and_refreshers.description: A refreshing blend of mixed berries, banana, and almond milk, offering a light and fruity drink perfect for starting the day or as an afternoon pick-me-up.

signature_smoothies_and_refreshers.name: Tropical Tranquilizer
signature_smoothies_and_refreshers.description: Mango, pineapple, coconut water, and a hint of mint come together to create a sweet, tropical smoothie with a refreshing twist.

signature_smoothies_and_refreshers.name: Green Harmony Smoothie
signature_smoothies_and_refreshers.description: Spinach, apple, cucumber, lemon, and a touch of ginger blend together to create a revitalizing smoothie that’s packed with nutrients and flavor.

signature_smoothies_and_refreshers.name: Iced Hibiscus Tea
signature_smoothies_and_refreshers.description: A vibrant and slightly sweet iced tea made from hibiscus flowers. This tea offers a tangy, tart flavor that’s perfect for a cooling refresher on hot days.

signature_smoothies_and_refreshers.name: Lemon & Ginger Refresher
signature_smoothies_and_refreshers.description: Fresh lemon juice, ginger, and a splash of honey combine to create a chilled, rejuvenating drink that’s both tangy and soothing.

signature_cold_brews.name: Cold Brew Éclat
signature_cold_brews.description: Smooth cold brew coffee served over ice with a splash of vanilla syrup. This cold brew is rich and smooth, with a touch of sweetness from the vanilla, perfect for coffee lovers seeking a chilled beverage.

signature_cold_brews.name: Nitro Cold Brew Serenité
signature_cold_brews.description: Cold brew infused with nitrogen, creating a creamy, rich texture. The nitrogen infusion adds a velvety mouthfeel to the cold brew, making for a luxurious and smooth coffee experience.

signature_cold_brews.name: Iced Lavender Latte
signature_cold_brews.description: Espresso, steamed milk, and a hint of lavender syrup, served over ice. This drink offers the perfect balance of floral lavender and rich espresso, creating a soothing and refreshing iced latte.
